title: I'm Trapped In a Negative Mindset
description:
Andrew says he's paralyzed by his negative self-image and isn't enjoying his life. - Dr. Laura: "Let your inner beauty shine."

What are you hard on yourself about? Email me your thoughts at: drlaura@drlaura.com 

To participate on the radio program; call 1-800-Dr-Laura / 1-800-375-2872 or make an appointment - https://www.drlaura.com/make-an-appointment.
